details.description: As a consultant with CapTech, I tackle every day with intellectual curiosity and relentless drive to create innovative technical solutions for a wide range of clients

CapTech is a technology consulting firm delivering innovative solutions in digital transformation, data analytics, and software development. They collaborate with clients to optimize systems, enhance customer experiences, and drive strategic business growth.

With a cohort of two other interns, I was tasked to build an application for Customer Support that used company data sources to provide context about Lumin's devices in a way that is efficient and digestible
Lumin is a smart panel company driven by its goal for homeowners to be able to control their home energy consumption in a way that is simple, efficient, and adaptive.

Over the course of 6 months, I sharpened my component-based web application development skills through various lectures and projects. At the end of the program during a three-week summer training period, I worked on one web application each week with four other group members to create functional, polished, and engaging applications with database and API integration.

Forge's mission is to empower and connect students with the skills and opportunities they need to thrive in their early careers, while also serving as a strategic partner for companies in building a diverse and exceptional talent pipeline.

I used Wix Website Editor to increase website traffic from an average of 60 sessions/month to over 1,050/month by completely redesigning their website and accommodating for a new brand direction. Additionally, I incorporated more engaging elements such as various animations, moving collages, and interactive photos to boost engagement
FilExcellence is a 501(c)(3) Non-profit organization dedicated to uplifting and empowering Filipinos around the globe through means of mentorship, fundraising, and event programming

The job of a Student Advisor is to ensure both OYFA's community and leadership feels safe, supported, and uplifted. It is also their role to respond accordingly to any acts of discrimination, harassment, and/or sexual violence within said community.
OYFA is dedicated to uplifting and empowering 300+ members by sharing and celebrating Filipino culture through means of event programming, community building, fundraising, and much more.

I worked with one other co-chair to lead a coalition of 40+ leaders representing different APISAA student organizations on Grounds and organized monthly roundtables to facilitate fruitful discussion about various topics, foster a caring and watchful environment for leaders to feel well supported, and supervise the scheduling of 150+ events

The Asian Student Union aims to unite, advocate for, and empower the APISAA community by fostering collaboration among APISAA organizations, providing programming for APISAA students, addressing APISAA concerns at the University, and advocating for APISAA issues.

I worked with a committee of five other people to plan, coordinate, and execute events intended to promote diversity, equity, and inclusion at the University of Virginia with 200+ attendees at each event.

Fourth Year Trustees are essentially the Fourth Year Class Council at UVA, who are tasked to identify and program events that include and uplift members of the Fourth Year Class to help foster community and build lasting relations between peers and the University.

As president, I acted as the face of the organization; established and/or maintained 50+ University and national-scale connections; led Executive Board meetings for a team of six; and facilitated risk management, conflict resolution, and organizational oversight over a team of 30+ people that plan 70+ events throughout the year.
OYFA is dedicated to uplifting and empowering 300+ members by sharing and celebrating Filipino culture through means of event programming, community building, fundraising, and much more.

projects.name: Rory.io
projects.projectDescription: A team of two interns and I were tasked with designing and implementing a single-page web applications using Vue.js for customer support at Lumin to assist with device troubleshooting and diagnostics. We accomplished this by pulling data from four different API's and formatting it in an intuitive manner. We also practiced version control and branch management with Git and used Node.js and NPM for development. Lumin also had a pre-existing library of Vue components we were able to use to keep consistent branding and UI. Lastly, we utilized an agile scrum methodology by participating in daily sprints in order to stay on task, develop achievable goals for each day, and remain in constant communication with team members and stakeholders.

projects.name: Daily Bugle Web Application
projects.videoTitle: Demo of Daily Bugle Web Application
projects.projectDescription: Over the course of four weeks, I developed a vanilla Javascript, HTML, and CSS web application that was supposed to act as a website for the "Daily Bugle." It also had a Node.js backend with various services to handle CRUD operations with a MongoDB database. By the end of the project, the application was ultimately containerized using Docker, with each container being deployed as a node within a single Kubernetes pod.

projects.name: Clustering and Regression COVID-19 Analysis
projects.videoTitle: Using K-Means Clustering and Linear Regression to Examine COVID-19 Trends in Virginia
projects.projectDescription: For this project I worked with a team of two other students to use machine learning models in order to investigate whether household income or population had significant effects on COVID-19-related hospitalizations and deaths in Virginia. This project was created for the Fall 2023 Semester of CS 4774: Machine Learning at UVA. Ultimately, we discovered that using a K-Means clustering model began to depict clusters heavily influenced by population because with an increased population there is bound to be more cases and hospitalizations. In terms of Linear Regression, we found that the model that we developed could not be considered accurate due to a high root mean squared error (RMSE).
